message.raw:
Fix more bugs in wait monitor implementation. Current problem is the range
of measurable pulses of a given device. Some cannot measure small pulses.
This would be fine if we were doing period measurement, but we are doing
semiperiod measurement...We don't actually care about the falling edges,
but the incomplete sample detection means we can't just measure rising edges
otherwise we won't know when we are at the start of the experiment and thus
can't compute a timeout time for the first wait. This is a major inconvenience!
